overview: Based on the graphic novel "A Sister" by Bastien Viv√®s. Tony, a young teenager, is on holiday at the seaside with his parents and his younger brother, Titi. Both spend most of their time drawing and on the beach. One day a family friend and her daughter Helen, join them on their vacation. Helen and Tony bond over the course of their trip as they experience and explore the world of romance, life, and purpose.
title: My Summer With Her
